info.name: pylogfunctionusage
info.summary: LogFunctionUsage in pylogfunctionusage is a Python decorator designed to enhance the logging capabilities of your functions by wrapping them in a try: block. It logs function usage, including calls, exceptions, and results, to an SQLite table
